testcase.name: user can view the dashboard
testcase.system-out: Given user go to "piton" page...............................................passed When user should redirect to login page if not authenticated "invalid_user" "invalid_password".passed And user types valid "automationtest" in username box and valid "123456789" in password box.passed And user should view notification message states no registered event found..passed And user should be able navigate edit event when click the edit event button.passed And user should be able to view event participants..........................passed And user should be able to delete event when click the delete button........passed
